# Bosch et al. Neuroimaging Speed Data

## Source
- **URL**: https://github.com/cboschp/wtlandscape_mbc
- **License**: MIT
- **Date Accessed**: 2025-01-19
- **Paper**: "The road to a whole mouse brain connectome"

## Description
Neuroimaging technology capabilities dataset including imaging rates, field of view, and dataset sizes across different imaging modalities and years.

## File
- `neuroimaging-speed.tsv` - Curated dataset of neuroimaging technology progress

## Attribution
When using this data, credit as:
```
Data: Bosch et al. (github.com/cboschp/wtlandscape_mbc)
```

## Update Instructions
1. Check for updates at https://github.com/cboschp/wtlandscape_mbc
2. Update `neuroimaging-speed.tsv` with new data
3. Update "Date Accessed" in this README
4. Regenerate figures: `python3 figures/run_all_figures.py neuroimaging-speed-comparison`
